title: American Sociological Review - Technologies of Expertise: Opioids and Pain Management’s Credibility Crisis

description: Author Jane Pryma discusses her article, "Technologies of Expertise: Opioids and Pain Management’s Credibility Crisis," published in the February 2022 issue of American Sociological Review.
